comment: Professor Davis was an awesome teacher. She is really engaged and wants her student to understand the importance of public speaking. Follow the guidebook and you will be fine. Attendance is mandatory, just show up.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Lively class and teacher. She's knowledgeable.  Good Teacher.
Just do the work, follow directions, and you'll be fine
